author: Ted
content:
Finally an image... after hundreds and hundreds.. that I don't as much like!!! Yeah. I mean you so effortlessly squeeze off stunning images that it's cool to be able to quibble... The crucifix for me is lost in the noise of the scene, particularly the glass. It is a distraction which pulls me from the story thread. And I don't think it's remedial unless you try an entirely different crop.

Of course, if this was anyone else's image it'd be a ten, for you... I give it a six. Usually when there's a technical distraction I just pass the image by. But since you don't have technical distractions... well, this baby stands out...

Ah well, I'm sure that you'll just go and turn out a dozen dazzlers over the next days which will once again make me think about trading in my camera for a clarinet. Sigh...
